snippet: For the past 300 years, the Ballinasloe Horse Fair and Festival in Ireland is where people have gone to trade skewbalds and piebalds, which today can go for anywhere between 200 and 10,000 euros.
lead_paragraph: For the past 300 years, the Ballinasloe Horse Fair and Festival in Ireland is where people have gone to trade skewbalds and piebalds, which today can go for anywhere between 200 and 10,000 euros.
